name: DigooLife
0:
”Alexa, turn on bedroom light”
”Alexa, turn off bedroom light”
”Alexa, turn on socket”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
DigooLife Skill make you control Alexa only with your voice command, free your hands with trivial operation command. That is what we hoped at the future.
DigooLife Skill can be set up with over 36 products(we`ll adding more) include smart plug, smart switch, smart socket, smart LED strip, smart camera, etc.
Here's a step by step guide:
1.Choose “Skills” in the options bar, and then search "DigooLife" in the search bar; Select "DigooLife" in the search results, and then click “Enable Skill”;
2.Input your BlitzWolf username and password;
3.Enable permission to link your Alexa account to your BlitzWolf account;
4.Tap “discover devices” in the Alexa App and add the smart socket. Or directly talk to the speaker: "Alexa, discover devices."
Through DigooLife, you can use your voice command such as "Alexa, turn on/off bedroom light."
"Alexa, turn on bedroom light."
"Alexa, turn off bedroom light."
"Alexa, turn on socket."
